xml.name: Redundant type conversions
xml.Text: The Redundant type conversions inspection warns you about redundant type conversions that can be omitted (for example, when you convert a string literal to a string). Read more about the inspection in Redundant type conversions.
xml.Try: See the the main function in the editor. The caret is on the []byte type casting from []byte(getData()). Press ShowIntentionActions to invoke intention actions.
Select Delete conversion and press EditorEnter.
